General Hospital Records Amendment Act of 198B Pursuant t o Section 412 of the District of Columbia Self- Government and Governmental Reorganization Act, P. l. 93-198 the Act the Counci l of the District of Columbia adopted Bil l No. 7-436 on first and second readings November 29, 1988, and December 13, 1988 respectively. Following the signature of the Mayor on December 21, 1988 this legislation was assigned Act No. 7-263 published in the January 6, 1989, edition of the D.C. Register Vol. 36 page 1) and transmitted to Congress on January 23, 1989 for a 3a-day review, in accordance with Section 6a2(c)(1) of the Act.
